ns2:li: Provides the capability of shutting off power to the information system or individual system components in emergency situations;

ns2:li.ns2:em: Assignment: organization-defined location by information system or system component
ns2:li.#text: Places emergency shutoff switches or devices in [] to facilitate safe and easy access for personnel; and

ns2:li: Protects emergency power shutoff capability from unauthorized activation.

ns2:p.#text: This control applies to facilities containing concentrations of information system resources, for example, data centers, server rooms, and mainframe computer rooms.
